title: Himi 169
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
’Eiki, ‘i he’eku nofo
Longo pē ‘i hoku fale,
Ke u fe’ao mo ho fono,
Pea u lau, mo fiefia;
‘Eiki, ‘i he ngaahi tala,
Ke ‘oua ke u ma’u ma’aku.
2.
Pea u fa’a lea lelei,
‘Eiki, ki ho’o folofola,
Ko ia, ‘e hā’ele ai,
‘A e ‘Eiki, kiate au,
Pea ta ‘a’eva mo au,
Ke tupu ai ‘eku ‘ofa.
3.
‘O kau ka tokoto hifo
Ke kau ‘a e folofola
Ke ne fakamohe lelei
Hoku sino kuo vaivai,
Pea te u ‘olunga ki he
Funga lelei ‘o e ‘Eiki.
4.
Pea u tu’u hake leva,
Pea u fakaongo atu,
‘A hoku Fakamo’ui,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē,
Pea au fa’a lea’aki,
‘A ho’ folofola lelei. *
